skill.name: web-research
skill.description: Use this skill for requests related to web research; it provides a structured approach to conducting comprehensive web research.
skill.summary: Use this skill for requests related to web research; it provides a structured approach to conducting...
skill.author: DougTrajano

security_audit.summary: This is a pure documentation skill that provides methodology guidance for web research. It contains no executable code, network calls, file access, or external commands. The skill only provides instructions on how to conduct research using existing AI tool capabilities.

content.value_statement: Stop wasting time with random web searches. This skill provides a proven methodology to plan, execute, and synthesize web research efficiently.
actual_capabilities: Teaches synthesis of findings from multiple sources
limitations: Does not include actual web search functionality
Requires existing web search tools in agent

use_cases.title: Academic Research Projects
use_cases.description: Structure your research for papers, theses, or dissertations with systematic planning and source tracking.

use_cases.title: Market and Competitor Analysis
use_cases.description: Gather and synthesize information about markets, competitors, or industry trends efficiently.

use_cases.title: Fact-Checking and Verification
use_cases.description: Verify claims and gather supporting evidence for articles, videos, or presentations.

prompt_templates.title: Basic Topic Research
prompt_templates.prompt: Research the history and current state of renewable energy adoption in Europe. Focus on solar and wind power statistics from 2020-2024.

prompt_templates.title: Comparative Analysis
prompt_templates.prompt: Compare the top 3 project management tools for remote teams: features, pricing, and user reviews. Include recent 2024 comparisons.

prompt_templates.title: Deep Investigation
prompt_templates.prompt: Investigate the impact of AI on healthcare diagnostics. Cover: current applications, regulatory challenges, accuracy studies, and ethical concerns.

prompt_templates.title: Trend Analysis
prompt_templates.prompt: Analyze the rise of generative AI in education. Include adoption rates, benefits, concerns, and future predictions from recent sources.

output_examples.input: Research the environmental impact of electric vehicles vs traditional cars
output: Electric vehicles produce 50-70% fewer emissions over their lifetime compared to gasoline cars
Battery production accounts for ~15% of EV's total environmental impact
EVs become more environmentally friendly after 18 months of average driving

best_practices: Always create a research plan before searching to stay focused and efficient
Break complex topics into 3-5 distinct subtopics to ensure comprehensive coverage
Cite all sources with URLs to maintain credibility and allow verification
anti_patterns: Jumping straight into searches without planning your research approach
Collecting information without organizing it by subtopics
Forgetting to synthesize findings into a coherent answer

faq.question: Does this skill perform web searches automatically?
faq.answer: No, it provides methodology guidance. You need web search tools in your agent to execute the actual searches.

faq.question: How many searches should I do per subtopic?
faq.answer: 3-5 searches per subtopic is usually sufficient. Focus on quality sources rather than quantity.

faq.question: Can I use this for any type of research?
faq.answer: Yes, the methodology works for academic, business, technical, or casual research across any topic.

faq.question: What if I can't find information on a subtopic?
faq.answer: Note the gap in your synthesis. This shows thorough research and helps identify areas needing more investigation.

faq.question: How do I handle conflicting information from different sources?
faq.answer: Present both viewpoints, cite the sources, and note the discrepancy. This demonstrates balanced research.

faq.question: Is this skill compatible with all AI assistants?
faq.answer: Yes, the methodology is platform-agnostic and works with Claude, Codex, Claude Code, and other AI tools.
